title: Kanye West Sued For Allegedly Raping, Drugging Ex-Assistant At Diddy Party
content: When Pisciotta told West she had no memory of that studio session, West allegedly laughed.
summary: When Pisciotta told West she had no memory of that studio session, West allegedly laughed.

title: Tim Walz Struggles With Shotgun At Pheasant Hunt, Gets Mocked
content: Dressed in hunting attire, including chaps and an orange vest, Democratic Vice Presidential candidate and Minnesota Governor Tim Walz was seen attempting to load shells into the semi-automatic shotgun and struggle.
summary: Dressed in hunting attire, including chaps and an orange vest, Democratic Vice Presidential candidate and Minnesota Governor Tim Walz was seen attempting to load shells into the semi-automatic shotgun and struggle.

title: German Neo-Nazi Dies After Falling Off Adolf Hitler's "Favourite Mountain"
content: A German neo-Nazi fell to his death while climbing Adolf Hitler's "favourite mountain" on September 29. Andreas Munzhuber, a senior member of the Bavarian faction of the neo-Nazi group The Third Way, was part of a climbing group of 30.
summary: A German neo-Nazi fell to his death while climbing Adolf Hitler's "favourite mountain" on September 29. Andreas Munzhuber, a senior member of the Bavarian faction of the neo-Nazi group The Third Way, was part of a climbing group of 30.

title: US Principal Accused Of Sexually Abusing Student "Nearly Every Day"
content: The lawsuit claims that Brett Kimmel groped the student, pressured her to perform oral sex and attempted to have sex with her just before her 18th birthday.
summary: The lawsuit claims that Brett Kimmel groped the student, pressured her to perform oral sex and attempted to have sex with her just before her 18th birthday.

title: Taiwan On Alert As Chinese Aircraft Carrier Group Detected
content: Taiwan said it was "on alert" as it detected a Chinese aircraft carrier group to its south on Sunday, days after the United States warned Beijing against taking "provocative" actions on the self-ruled island.
summary: Taiwan said it was "on alert" as it detected a Chinese aircraft carrier group to its south on Sunday, days after the United States warned Beijing against taking "provocative" actions on the self-ruled island.

title: "Garlic Can Kill Me": Woman Claims She Has "Vampire" Disease Like Dracula
content: A 32-year-old mother from Minnesota, US, has become the face of a rare and painful condition often referred to as "vampire disease." Phoenix Nightingale has a severe allergy to sulphur  a compound found in garlic.
summary: A 32-year-old mother from Minnesota, US, has become the face of a rare and painful condition often referred to as "vampire disease." Phoenix Nightingale has a severe allergy to sulphur  a compound found in garlic.

title: More Billionaires Back Kamala Harris Over Donald Trump. Who They Are
content: As the 2024 US presidential race heats up, billionaires across the country are quietly taking sides, providing significant financial backing to either Vice President Kamala Harris or former President Donald Trump.
summary: As the 2024 US presidential race heats up, billionaires across the country are quietly taking sides, providing significant financial backing to either Vice President Kamala Harris or former President Donald Trump.

title: A 9/11-Style Bombing Plan Was Scrapped Before Hamas Launched Israel Attack
content: On October 7, 2023, Hamas, the Palestinian militant group, launched a devastating and unprecedented attack on Israel. The scale and brutality of the assault left more than 1,200 people dead, and hundreds taken hostage.
summary: On October 7, 2023, Hamas, the Palestinian militant group, launched a devastating and unprecedented attack on Israel. The scale and brutality of the assault left more than 1,200 people dead, and hundreds taken hostage.

title: SpaceX To Attempt First-Ever Booster Catch With 'Chopstick' Arms
content: SpaceX's next test flight of its Starship megarocket this Sunday could mark a world first: catching the returning first-stage booster using the launch tower's "chopstick" arms -- a crucial step in the company's quest for rapid reusability.
summary: SpaceX's next test flight of its Starship megarocket this Sunday could mark a world first: catching the returning first-stage booster using the launch tower's "chopstick" arms -- a crucial step in the company's quest for rapid reusability.

title: "Real House Of Horrors": Woman Breaks Ankles In New York's Haunted House
content: Solainne Moncero-Tannis filed a lawsuit on October 2 in Queens Supreme Court, alleging she suffered two broken ankles while navigating the haunted attraction.
summary: Solainne Moncero-Tannis filed a lawsuit on October 2 in Queens Supreme Court, alleging she suffered two broken ankles while navigating the haunted attraction.

title: Missing Kids Spotted After 3 Years With Father, Mother Fears For Safety
content: The mother of three children who vanished with their fugitive father three years ago is now concerned for their safety after they were spotted in New Zealand bushland last week.
summary: The mother of three children who vanished with their fugitive father three years ago is now concerned for their safety after they were spotted in New Zealand bushland last week.

title: Mysterious White Blobs Washing Up On Canada Beach Leave Residents Baffled

title: Coca-Cola Insider Tried Selling Secrets To Pepsi. What Happened Next

title: Iran Rejects Claims Linking Tehran To Hamas' October 7 Attack On Israel
content: Iran's permanent mission to the United Nations in New York rejected claims linking Tehran to Hamas' October 7 surprise attack on Israel, the state media reported.
summary: Iran's permanent mission to the United Nations in New York rejected claims linking Tehran to Hamas' October 7 surprise attack on Israel, the state media reported.

title: Thousands Trapped In Gaza's Jabalia Camp As Israel Continues Deadly Attacks
content: Thousands of people are trapped in Gaza's Jabalia camp as Israeli forces attack the area, Medecins Sans Frontieres (Doctors Without Borders) said on Friday.
summary: Thousands of people are trapped in Gaza's Jabalia camp as Israeli forces attack the area, Medecins Sans Frontieres (Doctors Without Borders) said on Friday.

title: Venezuela Detains 4 US Citizens in Alleged CIA Plot Against Maduro
content: Venezuela’s Interior Minister has alleged that the detained individuals were part of a unit tasked with assassinating Maduro.

title: Woman Dies After Falling Overboard From Cruise Ship Off Channel Islands

title: First Wave Covid Infections Linked To Higher Heart Attack Risks: Study
content: As per the research, unvaccinated individuals infected with the virus in 2019 and 2020 are at a notably higher risk of experiencing a heart attack or stroke, with this risk lasting for up to three years after infection.
summary: As per the research, unvaccinated individuals infected with the virus in 2019 and 2020 are at a notably higher risk of experiencing a heart attack or stroke, with this risk lasting for up to three years after infection.

title: Kim Jong Un's Sister Warns Of "Horrible Disaster" As A Response To Drones
content: The powerful sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un warned Saturday that Seoul would face a "horrible disaster" if unmanned drones reached Pyongyang again, a day after accusing the South of launching such aircraft at the capital.
summary: The powerful sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un warned Saturday that Seoul would face a "horrible disaster" if unmanned drones reached Pyongyang again, a day after accusing the South of launching such aircraft at the capital.

title: New Israeli Strikes Outside Hezbollah Strongholds Kill 15, Says Lebanon
content: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on three villages outside traditional Hezbollah strongholds had killed at least 15 people Saturday, as state media reported further strikes elsewhere
summary: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on three villages outside traditional Hezbollah strongholds had killed at least 15 people Saturday, as state media reported further strikes elsewhere
